name: Zombie Kill
description: Kill incoming zombies from all sides and survive till the end. Kill Me If U Cann offers real-life shooting experience and great immersion. There are 3 Modes consisting of 3 difficulties to provide players the best experience of each individual's skills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080
